messages.subject: Re: Dealing with the state system   WAS Re: Digest Number 278
messages.msgSnippet: ***How do you explain to your local Public Education board (especially if you at one time had a child in the public school system) as to how you base your day
messages.messageBody:
***How do you explain to your local Public Education board (especially if
you at one time had a child in the public school system) as to how you
base your day when they want an account of your children's daily
educational plans
how we as parents assess the children reaching their goals so you can
move forward and so forth***


You can look at and modify and use this course of study written by Pam
Sorooshian. Read through it and see if it can be changed to suit your
needs.

http://homepage.mac.com/pamsoroosh/iblog/unschooling/index.html


And this curriculum by Carol Narigon, which Pam's course of study was
based on, can be modified to suit your situation too.

http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingcurriculum.html


Deb Lewis
